Posts.Content: This is my second year on Tamoxifen and I have had bad joint pain as well as being tired,etc, etc,.   Now my joints will hardly bend.  Having difficulty walking.  I was diagnosed Stage 1 with no node involvement.  Several doctors have recommended that I have me onc check the numbers.  It might be better to go off the mediation and have some quality of life.   Absolutley could not take Femara.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Side Effects

Posts.Content:
I have been on Tamoxifen for six months. I am so tired I just don't care about
 anything. Has anyone found solutions to help with energy levels?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Tiredness
